mention.text: a critical function of an Automatic Speech Recognition -LRB- ASR -RRB- System working on real applications where spontaneous speech , out-of-vocabulary -LRB- OOV -RRB- words and acoustic noises are present
two based on acoustic measures and one founded on linguistic information , applied in a hierarchical structure
